text: The 1998 Division Two Championship season was the third tier of British rugby league during the 1998 season. ==Championship== The league was won by Lancashire Lynx. No teams were promoted, as the First and Second Divisions were merged to form a single division which would later become known as the Northern Ford Premiership. ===League table=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width=20 abbr="Position" | !width=175 |Team !width=20 abbr="Played" |Pld !width=20 abbr="Won" |W !width=20 abbr="Drawn" |D !width=20 abbr="Lost" |L !width=20 abbr="Points for" |PF !width=20 abbr="Points against" |PA !width=20 abbr="Points" |Pts |- style="background:#FFD700;" |1||style="text-align:left;"|Lancashire Lynx |20||13||2||5||561||339||28 |- |2||style="text-align:left;"|York Wasps |20||14||0||6||476||280||28 |- |3||style="text-align:left;"|Batley Bulldogs |20||13||0||7||437||354||26 |- |4||style="text-align:left;"|Bramley |20||12||1||7||487||386||25 |- |5||style="text-align:left;"|Oldham |20||10||1||9||399||383||21 |- |6||style="text-align:left;"|Barrow Border Braves |20||8||2||10||354||377||18 |- |7||style="text-align:left;"|Workington Town |20||3||2||15||293||558||8 |- |8||style="text-align:left;"|Doncaster Dragons |20||2||2||16||289||619||6 |} {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%" |bgcolor="#FFD700"|Champions |} ==See also== *Super League war *1998 Challenge Cup ==References== ==External links== * *1998 season at wigan.rlfans.com Category:RFL League 1 RFL Division Two
